title: Chalkboard fonts
content:
Hey guys,

you might have noticed the trend (or you might be sick of it by now) of Chalkboards with handdrawn lettering etc.  
I was wondering if you could pass me some tips, cause I need to do a chalkboard for a wedding.

Attached is some inspiration, could anyone say what the designer could have based the top font on? "Caroline & Andrio"

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150425082904im_/http:/typophile.com/files/c86bdbb7cd417159b76d6fe55261731b_5420.jpg)
author: AnaBanana

comments.content: Do your layout, print on cello or other clear medium and use an overhead projector (unless you are an idiot savant with a photographic memory!)
It appears to be based on Applewood, published in 2009 by Stephen Miggas of Aerotype.
